ValidationRule.description: This rule requires a serial number be entered on the quote line if the customer loyalty promo is being applied and the promo is being applied to the quote line.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( ApplyPromoDiscount__c = TRUE, Promo__c = "a2u3C0000004wIy", ISBLANK(SBCF_Serial_Number__c) ) && Business_Group__c="Core"
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Missing Serial Number. Required on the Quote Line when you apply the Customer Loyalty Promo.
